titleStmt.title: [Relation of sixtene martyrs glorified in England in twelve moneths] [with a declaration, that English catholiques suffer for the catholique religion, and that the seminarie priests agree with the Jesuites / by Thomas Worthington]
titleStmt.author: Worthington, Thomas, 1549-1627.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the widow of James Boscard,

notesStmt.note: Title page lacking. Title, author, and imprint information from typed surrogate.
Signatures: A-F⁸, added leaf: An Advertisement to the reader.
Imperfect: cropped, worn, stained, with print show-through and loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
